Reference

High-level Primary Functions

Choose either bulk data download or API-based download

studiesTable

A list of available studies from the cBioPortal data repository

cBioDataPack()

Obtain pre-packaged data from cBioPortal and represent as a MultiAssayExperiment object

cBioPortalData()

Download data from the cBioPortal API

Low-level API interface

Conveniently explore the cBioPortal API

cBioPortal() getStudies() clinicalData() molecularProfiles() mutationData() molecularData() searchOps() geneTable() samplesInSampleLists() sampleLists() allSamples() genePanels() getGenePanel() genePanelMolecular() getGenePanelMolecular() getSampleInfo() getDataByGenePanel()

The R interface to the cBioPortal API Data Service

cBioPortal-class

A class for representing the cBioPortal API protocol

Helper functions

Miscellaneous

cBioCache() setCache() removeCache()

Manage cache / download directories for study data
